ej,gardr001,C,fostm901,Fair/foul call (Reversed) $David Ortiz hit the 0-2 pitch down the RF line; it was ruled a home run by 1B umpire Marty Foster; when the Red Sox complained about the call, it was reversed by crew chief and 3B umpire Jim McKean; Twins coach Ron Gardenhire ejected by Foster

ej,ortid001,P,craft901,Fair/foul call (Broke bat over leg) $David Ortiz struck out on the pitch after the foul ball; as he left the plate, he broke his bat over his leg and dropped it at HP; Ortiz ejected by HP umpire Terry Craft
ej,shipc001,P,dimur901,Bench jockeying $Angels Shipley, not game, ejected by HP umpire DiMuro for complaining that Angels had to bat in rain but game was stopped for Red Sox
